headline: CPI, S&P 500 Additions and Other Key Things to Watch this Week
summary: Markets enter a pivotal week following Friday's weak August jobs report that created a complex backdrop for investors, simultaneously bolstering hopes for more aggressive Fed rate cuts while raising concerns about economic momentum stalling. Here are 5 things to watch this week.

headline: What EMCOR Group (EME)'s Addition to the S&P 500 Means For Shareholders
summary: AppLovin, Robinhood, and engineering services firm EMCOR Group were recently added to the S&P 500 Index as part of the quarterly rebalancing effective September 22, 2025, replacing MarketAxess Holdings, Caesars Entertainment, and Enphase Energy. EMCOR Group’s inclusion in the S&P 500 often prompts increased interest and fund flows from index-tracking assets, underscoring its growing presence within the market. We will examine how joining the S&P 500 could affect EMCOR Group’s investment...
